name: Roundify for Roblox
description:
Roundify for Roblox; a theme that adds some smooth curves to Roblox's webpage.
Check out my Twitter and tweet at me if you have any suggestions, reports, comments, or similar: @freshpep_
additional_info:
v2.3 [10/2/17] (first update in a while; Thanks so much for 21k+ installs!)
- Fixed scaling on home page for low res
- Significantly increased loading time using minified CSS
- Rounded a few more things
- Tweaked avatar icons back to circles (feedback please)!
- Added a few aesthetic tweaks

v2.2.1 [7/15/17] (quick patch)
- Fixed scaling on profile page tabs

v2.2 [7/15/17] (Sorry for the delays!)
- Rounded more things (messages page, more profile stuff, new catalog slightly modified, and a bit more)
- Optimized a few portions of the code, not as much as last update though

v2.1 [5/28/17] (Making test build below an official build)
- Rounded more things
- Fixed a few bugs (especially R+ ones)
- Tab edit on game pages and avatar editor (feedback please!)
- Optimized minor portions of the code

v2.0 [5/7/17] (test build, update optional)
- Rewritten
- Bug fixes
- Efficiency improvements, slightly faster loading times on slower devices
- A few animations added (sidebar slide-in, testing)
- Testing some options for future customization
If some things seem removed in this update, that's because they are. I'm working on entirely rewriting them!

Notice [4/23/17]:
Wow, I really didn't expect this theme to blow up. I'll get to updating it and taking feedback, sorry for the inactivity! I haven't been on userstyles in forever :o

(v1.5 and lowers' changelogs were removed for space conservation!)

discussions.name: sometimes something can go wrong with the sidebar
